attributes.action: reconnect his government to the ideals of decency,democracy,integrity,honour and honesty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the idea of this petition is to bring to the attention of the prime minister the demise of decency,democracy,integrity,honour and honesty among elected and non elected members of his government.

rejection.details: Your petition needs to be a recognisable action related to government policy. Please reword the title of your petition to make it clear what action you are requesting the government take.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
